Title: Create a Shopping Mall Without Coding: A Completely Different Smart Design Easy

Meta Description: With Smart Design Easy, creating an online shopping mall is now as simple as a few clicks, without the need for any coding knowledge. Find out how you can design your own shopping mall using this innovative tool!

Introduction:

Creating an online shopping mall can be a daunting task, especially if you don't have any coding knowledge. However, with the Smart Design Easy tool, you can now create your own shopping mall with just a few clicks! This revolutionary tool makes designing a shopping mall easy and accessible to everyone, regardless of their technical expertise.

In this article, we'll take a closer look at how you can use Smart Design Easy to create your own shopping mall without any coding. We'll explore the features and benefits of this tool and show you just how easy it is to use.

What is Smart Design Easy?

Smart Design Easy is a new tool from Cafe24 that allows users to create their own online shopping mall without any coding knowledge. This tool is designed to be simple and easy to use, making it accessible to everyone.

How does Smart Design Easy work?

Smart Design Easy works by providing users with a variety of pre-made templates and design elements that they can customize to create their own unique shopping mall. Users can select from a range of templates and design elements, including header, footer, smart banner, and more. All of these elements can be easily customized using a simple drag-and-drop interface.

Designing Your Shopping Mall with Smart Design Easy

To start designing your shopping mall with Smart Design Easy, simply select a template and hit edit. From here, you can customize your shop's main page, pop-up window, header, smart banner, footer, and more, without having to enter the admin page. You can easily click and drag the elements to move them around or add new sections using the "+" button.

Managing Product Display with Smart Design Easy

One of the best things about Smart Design Easy is that you can manage product display directly from within the editing tool. While setting up your shopping mall design, you can use the pre-registered product information to load and display products directly. This saves time and makes managing your product display much easier.

PC and Mobile Designs with Smart Design Easy

Smart Design Easy allows you to see how your design will look on both PC and mobile screens. This tool provides a WYSIWYG (what you see is what you get) service, which means that what you see on the screen is what you get in real life. You can make edits in real-time, allowing you to see the results of your changes right away.

Who can use Smart Design Easy?

Smart Design Easy is perfect for anyone who wants to create their own online shopping mall without the need for coding knowledge. This tool is ideal for beginners who are just starting out, as well as experienced users who want a simpler and more streamlined way to design their shopping mall.

A: No, Smart Design Easy is designed to be easy and accessible to everyone, regardless of their technical expertise.

A: Yes, you can manage product display directly from within the editing tool.
